"DreamWeaver": A Smart Mattress that tracks sleep patterns and provides personalized recommendations for improvement.
"SleepStory": A Mobile App that generates immersive, personalized bedtime stories based on user preferences and sleep goals.
"DreamJournal": A Wearable Device that tracks and records dreams, providing insights into the subconscious mind.
"SleepScape": A Virtual Reality Experience that simulates relaxing environments to improve sleep quality.
"MindMeld": A Brain-Computer Interface that allows users to control their sleep environment with their thoughts.
